long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Infinity Worlds is an online 4X strategy and tactics game that seamlessly blends the best elements of turn-based gameplay, real-time strategy, and civilization warfare. Set in a distant future where advanced civilizations compete for control of the cosmos, this real-time strategy game challenges you to build and command your interstellar empire. Explore and colonize uncharted planets, expanding your influence across the galaxy. Engage in epic space battles, where tactical decisions and quick thinking are crucial for victory. Develop and expand your futuristic cities on newly colonized worlds, managing resources and constructing advanced technologies to strengthen your dominion. Powered by blockchain technology, the game offers a secure and decentralized experience, allowing you to truly own and trade rare in-game assets. In this ever-evolving universe, every decision shapes your destiny.
